Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui

Guided Configuration Wizard creation This package contains classes that provide the possibility to create wizard for the tresos GUI.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WidgetFactory
    This is the WidgetFactory class which handles widget creation as well as registration of custom widgets to the framework.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WidgetFactory.ButtonFlags
    ButtonFlags determine the style and behaviour of buttons.
    WidgetFactory.GroupDecoration
    This enum represents the border decoration of a group
    WidgetFactory.GroupLayout
    Determines the layout of the contents of a group.
    WidgetFactory.TableFlags
    Provides flags that control various features of a table
    WidgetFactory.TextFormat
    Determines the text format of the widget.
    WidgetFactory.TreeTableFlags
    Provides flags that control various features of a treetable

Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui Description

Guided Configuration Wizard creation

This package contains classes that provide the possibility to create wizard for the tresos GUI. The widgets of the wizard are created via the WidgetFactory class and registered to its memento. Operations on the mementos are made via the MementoOperationHandler, that supports undo/redo operations.

The core classes for creating a guided configuration wizard are:

  • WidgetFactory: The Factory and Registry for all GUI widgets.
  • MementoOperationHandler: The handler class for all memento operations
  • AbstractWidgetController: Abstract implementation of a controller to control a custom widget
  • ISWTWidget: Interface for the gui part of the widget

The standard widgets creatable via the WidgetFactory are:

  • SWTCheckBox: A checkbox widget
  • SWTCombo: A dropdown widget that can be of type String, Integer or Float
  • SWTGroup: A grouping widget with three different styles
  • SWTLabel: A label that can be used to describe other widgets
  • SWTTable: A table widget, whose columns are described via SWTColumnDescriptions
  • SWTText: A text widget that can be of type String, Integer or Float
